column4: Support for marketing and public relations activities to raise brand awareness and promote products or services in overseas markets. This includes activities like media campaigns, press releases, and promotional content.
column6: MRA Grant: Overseas Market Presence Pillar
column7: Raise brand awareness via media campaigns, press releases, and promotions.

column4: Funding to participate in physical or virtual trade fairs to showcase products/services, connect with potential buyers, and explore new business opportunities in target markets.
column6: MRA Grant: Overseas Market Presence Pillar
column7: Showcase products at trade fairs to find buyers and explore market opportunities.

column4: Support for engaging consultants or business matchmakers to identify and connect with reliable overseas distributors, agents, or business partners.
column6: MRA Grant: Overseas Business Development Pillar
column7: Connect with reliable distributors, agents, or partners via consultants.

column4: Support for hiring in-market business development consultants or representatives to help establish networks, grow business, and build relationships within the target market.
column6: MRA Grant: Overseas Business Development Pillar
column7: Hire reps to build networks, grow business, and develop relationships locally.

column4: Support for setting up a sustained online or physical marketing presence in overseas markets, including localized websites, digital ads, e-commerce platforms, or showrooms.
column6: MRA Grant: Overseas Business Development Pillar
column7: Set up online/physical presence with localized sites, ads, e-commerce, or showrooms.

column4: Assistance for activities required to enter a new market, such as market feasibility studies, legal and regulatory assessments, or market entry strategy development.
column6: MRA Grant: Overseas Market Set-up Pillar
column7: Get help with feasibility studies, legal checks, and market entry strategies.

column4: Support for consulting services to navigate Free Trade Agreements (FTA), customs compliance, and trade regulations to ensure smooth cross-border trade.
column6: MRA Grant: Overseas Market Set-up Pillar
column7: Navigate FTAs, customs, and trade rules for smooth cross-border operations.
